heading: Total Visits (2024)
blurb: That’s about one visit for every person in the United States.

heading: Most-Visited Park (2024)
blurb: 13.4 million visitors—more than the next two parks combined.

heading: Parks Within Reach
blurb: Over 80 % of Americans live within a two-hour drive of a National Park System site.

heading: Economic Impact (2024)
blurb: Visitor spending in gateway communities supported 378 000 jobs.

heading: Protected Land
blurb: That’s larger than the entire state of Minnesota.

heading: Park Diversity
blurb: Only 63 are designated National Parks—the rest are monuments, battlefields, rivers, and more.
